summary: Red Hot Chili Peppers are a super popular American rock band from Los Angeles, formed in 1982. They mix lots of music styles like rock, funk, and hip hop. The band has sold over 120 million records and won three Grammy Awards. Their most famous albums include "Blood Sugar Sex Magik" and "Californication." The band has had some changes in members over the years, but the current group has been together since 2019. They released two new albums in 2022.
title: Red Hot Chili Peppers
